name: Larry Lizard's HOT and SPICY Pepper Caper
name_original: Larry Lizard's HOT and SPICY Pepper Caper
description:
My first One Game a Month game!

It came out pretty janky but I'm proud of it. 

Time Spent: ~20hrs

Programming/Music/Design: Me (Jon Bowman)

Art:  My best friend who unfortunately doesn't really have an online presence, but when that changes I will update this

Music: Escape on a Flatbed by The Lemming Shepherds
